模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.model

类 ResourceCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ResourceCard
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
直接已知子类:
GoldCard
public class ResourceCard extends Card implements Serializable
Represents a ResourceCard in the game, which extends Card. A ResourceCard has additional properties such as kingdom and base points.
另请参阅:

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ResourceCard

      public ResourceCard()
      Constructs a new ResourceCard with default values.

    • ResourceCard

      public ResourceCard(int code, boolean isFront, Map<CornerPosition,Elements> corners)
      Constructs a new ResourceCard with the specified code, orientation, and corner elements.
      参数:
      code - the unique code of the card
      isFront - the orientation of the card
      corners - the elements at the corners of the card

    • ResourceCard

      public ResourceCard(int code, boolean isFront, Map<CornerPosition,Elements> corners, Elements elem, int basePoint)
      Constructs a new ResourceCard with the specified properties.
      参数:
      code - the unique code of the card
      isFront - the orientation of the card
      corners - the elements at the corners of the card
      elem - the kingdom element associated with the card
      basePoint - the base points of the card

    • checkRequirements

      public boolean checkRequirements(Board board)
      Checks if the requirements for this ResourceCard are met on the given board. By default, this method returns true. Subclasses can override this method to implement specific requirements.
      参数:
      board - the board to check
      返回:
      true if the requirements are met, false otherwise
      另请参阅:
